dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: Hello there. I am {npc.name} the mage, studying Promethia Island.

response.message: Tell me more about this Promethia Island.

dialog.name: more
dialog.message: It is a small island south of Strakewood Island. The interesting part is the volcano on the island.
The island can be reached by taking a ship on the eastern shore of Strakewood, roughly southeast from here.

dialog.name: volcano
dialog.message: The volcano is said to be very deep, with an almost infinite depth.
